name: It never ends (itch) (murten101)
description:
A simple game made in 3 days for the Zeno Game jam.

worked on it for for 2 days since i was busy on the second day

STORY: you are a German police man in a zombie apocalypse. thats the story idk what you expected, i write code not storys.

CONTROLS:
WASD to move
Arrow keys to shoot

TIP: you can follow the road to move to different areas of the map

CREDIT:
Sound: All sound is from https://freesound.org/
Map assets: https://kenney.nl/assets/retro-urban-kit
Player character: https://stephrobertgames.itch.io/german-police-officer
Zombie: https://www.cgtrader.com/free-3d-models/character/other/rotten-meater-monster
Code: all written by yours truly during the jam
